mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PR_RSV_SALE_HIST( /* prPregRsvSaleHistTrx.applyPregRsvSaleHist */ GOODS_NO , RSV_STRT_DTM , RSV_END_DTM , FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD , RSV_STOP_YN , RSV_STOP_CAUS_CD , RSV_STOP_DTM , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM ) SELECT #{goodsNo} , RSV_STRT_DTM , RSV_END_DTM , FWDIDC_PRAR_DY , RSV_END_AF_PROC_METH_CD , 'N' , NULL , NULL , #{sysRegId} , now() , #{sysRegId} , now() FROM PR_PREG_RSV_SALE_HIST WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo}
